wikipedia_page.main: Taryn Lewis 'Taz' Taylor (born 21 January 1998 in Mansfield, Nottinghamshire) is a British former Grand Prix motorcycle racer as a result of participating in the Moto3 event as a Wildcard ride at the 2015 British Grand Prix at Silverstone.He now races in the British MotoStar Championship aboard a KTM RC 250 GP.
